install.name: Custom Properties Tags Cloud
install.author: Andrea Forghieri
install.copyright: (C) 2007-2011 Andrea Forghieri, Solidsystem - http://www.solidsystem.it All rights reserved.
install.description: This module shows a tags cloud based on Custom Properties's tags frequency. The font size depends on tag popularity. The more the tags the bigger the font. To customize the look edit file cpcloud.css in module directory or define CSS classes from cpcloud1 to cpcloud5 in your template stylesheet.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: tags_threshold
param.label: Tags count threshold
param.description: Show tags when their number is equal or greater than threshold. Leave empty to show all tags

param.name: use_cpcloud_stylesheet
param.label: Use cpcloud stylesheet
param.description: Yes: use the cpcloud CSS style sheet

param.name: bind_to_ce
param.label: Bind to content element
param.description: Generate the cloud from this content element only. If a wrong content elements name is provide, the search will be performed on standard content items only. Leave empty to search all content elements

param.name: bind_to_section
param.label: Bind to section(s)
param.description: Comma separated list of sections to generate the cloud from. Leave empty to use all sections
